title: Chuuko demo Koi ga Shitai! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Mature   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manga   Appearance Changes   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Delinquents   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Mismatched Couple   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Otaku   R-15   Reluctant Protagonist   Secrets   Strong Love Interests   Trap   Tsundere   Younger Sisters
author: Noritake Tao
description: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school… eroge otaku who’s given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he’s bought a bunch of new material as a result of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be “used goods,” he encounters a delinquent-looking girl about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who’s got all kind of rumors about her – especially that she’s “used goods.” And it appears that she’s set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.>
